title: Step2 LifeStyle Custom Kitchen™ - Brights
description: Brighten up a child's playroom with the LifeStyle Custom Kitchen Brights by Step2. Kids can pretend to cook a meal with the realistic and electronic appliances in this compact play kitchen. Children's imaginations will come alive as they play with the different kitchen appliances of the Custom Kitchen.

asset.author: Step2
asset.description:
Brighten up a child's playroom with the LifeStyle Custom Kitchen Brights by Step2. Kids can pretend to cook a meal with the realistic and electronic appliances in this compact play kitchen. Children's imaginations will come alive as they play with the different kitchen appliances of the Custom Kitchen.

Learn more at: http://www.step2.com/p/LifeStyle-Custom-Kitchen-Brights

transcripts: Brighten up any play space with this cheerful lifestyle custom kitchen from Step2. Equally suited to both boys and girls, It's brightly colored appliances and decals make pretend cooking even more fun. The framed window and wall paper border all add to its colorful charm. This kitchen is packed with realistic touches. The phone has fun electronic sounds. On the stove top, a special frying pan and pot activate sizzling and boiling noises and there's even a microwave. No detail was overlooked when designing the lifestyle custom kitchen. The fridge has a builtin water dispenser and plenty of storage space inside. The oven and microwave offer additional storage. The roomy basket holds plenty of fruits and veggies. When cooking is done, you're little one can practice washing dishes in the deep sink with movable faucet. This kitchen comes with a full set of accessories. Like all Step2 toys, the lifestyle custom kitchen is durably built for years of worry free play. Whether you're little one is already a wiz in the kitchen or is just learning the basics, this gourmet kitchen will provide hours of educational entertainment.
